info.title: Vi-En Reflex Trainer API
info.description: API for Vietnamese-English reflex training application

post.description:
Register a new user

- **email**: Valid email address (unique)
- **username**: Username 3-50 characters (unique)
- **password**: Password min 6 characters
- **full_name**: Optional full name

Login with email and password

- **email**: User email address
- **password**: User password

Refresh access token using refresh token

- **refresh_token**: Valid refresh token

get.description:
Get current authenticated user information

Requires: Bearer token in Authorization header

Get all lessons with pagination and search

- **page**: Page number (default: 1)
- **page_size**: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- **search**: Optional search query

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

post.description:
Create a new lesson

Requires: Admin authentication

- **title**: Lesson title (required)
- **description**: Lesson description (optional)
- **order_index**: Display order (default: max + 1)

get.description:
Get a specific lesson by ID

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

put.description:
Update a lesson

Requires: Admin authentication

delete.description:
Delete a lesson

Requires: Admin authentication

Note: This will also delete all associated sentences (cascade)

get.description:
Get count of sentences in a lesson

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

Get all sentences with pagination, filtering, and search

- **page**: Page number (default: 1)
- **page_size**: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- **lesson_id**: Filter by specific lesson (optional)
- **search**: Search query (optional)

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

post.description:
Create a new sentence

Requires: Admin authentication

- **lesson_id**: Lesson ID (required)
- **vi_text**: Vietnamese text (required)
- **en_text**: English text (required)
- **order_index**: Display order (default: max + 1 for lesson)

get.description:
Get a specific sentence by ID

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

put.description:
Update a sentence

Requires: Admin authentication

delete.description:
Delete a sentence

Requires: Admin authentication

Note: This will also delete associated audio files

post.description:
Bulk create sentences for a lesson

Requires: Admin authentication

- **lesson_id**: Lesson ID (required)
- **sentences**: List of sentences with vi_text and en_text

schema.title: Response Bulk Create Sentences Api V1 Sentences Bulk Post

get.description:
Get audio file for a sentence

- **sentence_id**: Sentence ID
- **language**: Language code ('vi' or 'en')

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

Returns: MP3 audio file

Note: Audio is generated on-demand if not exists and cached for future requests

delete.description:
Delete cached audio files for a sentence

This is a public endpoint to allow cache invalidation

Use case: When sentence text is updated

get.description:
Get next sentence for practice

Smart selection algorithm:
- For authenticated users: Returns least practiced sentence (excluding recently practiced < 5 min)
- For guests: Returns random sentence

- **lesson_id**: Optional lesson filter

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

post.description:
Record a practice session

For authenticated users: Updates progress tracking
For guests: No-op (returns success but doesn't save)

- **sentence_id**: Sentence that was practiced

Public endpoint (guest + registered users)

get.description:
Get practice statistics for authenticated user

Returns:
- **total_practiced**: Total number of sentences practiced
- **total_practice_count**: Total practice sessions
- **lesson_stats**: Per-lesson breakdown (if lesson_id provided)

Requires: Authentication (guests will get 401)

Get list of sentence IDs that user has practiced in a lesson

Returns:
- **sentence_ids**: List of practiced sentence IDs

For authenticated users: Returns actual practiced IDs
For guests: Returns empty list

parameters.name: lesson_id

schema.description: Lesson ID to get practiced sentences for
schema.title: Lesson Id

parameters.description: Lesson ID to get practiced sentences for

get.description:
Get all users with pagination and search

Requires: Admin authentication

- **page**: Page number (default: 1)
- **page_size**: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- **search**: Optional search query (email or username)
- **is_admin**: Filter by admin status (true/false)
- **is_active**: Filter by active status (true/false)

post.description:
Create a new user

Requires: Admin authentication

- **email**: User email (required, unique)
- **username**: Username (required, unique)
- **password**: Password (required)

get.description:
Get a specific user by ID

Requires: Admin authentication

put.description:
Update a user

Requires: Admin authentication

- **is_active**: Active status (optional)
- **is_admin**: Admin status (optional)
- **password**: New password (optional)

Note: Email and username cannot be changed

delete.description:
Delete a user

Requires: Admin authentication

Note: Cannot delete your own account

patch.description:
Update user password

Requires: Admin authentication

- **password**: New password (min 6 characters)

get.description:
Get user statistics

Requires: Admin authentication

Returns counts of total, active, inactive, and admin users
